response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age", "high", "At 21, the individual is in an age group statistically associated with higher rates of recidivism due to risk-taking behavior and developmental factors."],
    ["Arrest History", "medium", "A single arrest with no conviction indicates some contact with the justice system, suggesting a moderate level of risk, though it is not compounded by a criminal record."],
    ["Education", "high", "Lacking a high school diploma or GED is strongly linked with limited opportunities and is considered a high risk factor for recidivism."],
    ["Employment", "medium", "Having held only one job in the past year may reflect employment instability, contributing moderately to risk."],
    ["Substance Use", "low", "No recent drug use is a protective factor, reducing the likelihood of recidivism related to substance-related offenses."],
    ["Mental Health", "low", "Not experiencing depression recently serves as a protective factor in reducing recidivism risk related to untreated mental health issues."],
    ["Family Structure", "medium", "Living alone currently and past family dynamics (living with biological mother in a household of 4) suggest moderate social support, contributing to a medium risk."],
    ["Residential Area", "medium", "Growing up in an urban area can be associated with higher exposure to criminal activity, thereby moderately increasing risk."],
    ["Religiosity", "medium", "The belief that God is unrelated to personal events may indicate lower engagement with community support systems, adding a moderate level of risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: At 21, the individual is in an age group statistically associated with higher rates of recidivism due to risk-taking behavior and developmental factors.
A single arrest with no conviction indicates some contact with the justice system, suggesting a moderate level of risk, though it is not compounded by a criminal record.
Lacking a high school diploma or GED is strongly linked with limited opportunities and is considered a high risk factor for recidivism.
Having held only one job in the past year may reflect employment instability, contributing moderately to risk.
No recent drug use is a protective factor, reducing the likelihood of recidivism related to substance-related offenses.
Not experiencing depression recently serves as a protective factor in reducing recidivism risk related to untreated mental health issues.
Living alone currently and past family dynamics (living with biological mother in a household of 4) suggest moderate social support, contributing to a medium risk.
Growing up in an urban area can be associated with higher exposure to criminal activity, thereby moderately increasing risk.
The belief that God is unrelated to personal events may indicate lower engagement with community support systems, adding a moderate level of risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 6 inches and weighs 287 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 4, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
